definition: to raise one's head and look
to stick up/to rise on one end/to tilt
outstanding/to raise
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
to hold one's breath (in anticipation) (idiom)/to anxiously await

sentences.english: You should send a message to your family, maybe they are looking forward to it!
sentences.chinese: 给您的家人报一声平安，或许他们正在翘首企盼。

sentences.english: Year in and year out, coir raincoat and bamboo hat keep searching by raising their heads and looking far ahead.
sentences.chinese: 江南的蓑衣和竹笠经年地寻找，在远远的翘首远望。

sentences.english: Is Man MOT the medical website you've been waiting for, guys?
sentences.chinese: 兄弟，“男性年检”是你翘首以盼的医疗网站吗？

sentences.english: Several thousand supporters strained to catch a glimpse of the new president.
sentences.chinese: 几千名支持者翘首企盼能一睹新总统的风采。

sentences.english: I went from being on the fence about a sixth season to kind of hoping that there’ll be a seventh.
sentences.chinese: 刚刚还在观望第六季的我已经开始翘首企盼第七季了。

sentences.english: All of this is long overdue.
sentences.chinese: 大家早就翘首期待这一切的到来。

sentences.english: The current lack of personalization, which digital buyers have almost come to expect.
sentences.chinese: 目前缺少个性化，而这正是在线买家翘首以盼的。

sentences.english: For now, though, Chinese filmgoers can only wait.
sentences.chinese: 现在中国观众能做的只有翘首以待了。

sentences.english: The people in straitened circumstances are in dire anticipation of housing improvement .
sentences.chinese: 困难群众对改善住房翘首以盼。

sentences.english: Several long-awaited videos will finally arrive in the shops this month.
sentences.chinese: 几部让人翘首企盼的录像片终于将在这个月到货。

sentences.english: Time goes by quickly, we were waiting for today for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 时间飞逝，我们已翘首企盼今天这个日子好久了。

sentences.english: BREITLING is multi-purpose watch production look fashionable and unique and durable.
sentences.chinese: 是生产款式新颖独特而耐用的多用途手表的翘首。

definition: to raise one's head and look into the distance/fig. to forward to/to long for
to long for/eager for
to hold one's breath (in anticipation) (idiom)/to anxiously await
to anxiously await
to crane one's neck/(fig.) with one's neck outstretched in expectation
to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
to look into the distance
to stand for a long time
to look far ahead/to look forward (to)
to survey the scene from an elevated position
to look forward to
to look/to raise one's eyes
lit. on tiptoes/to look forward eagerly/to long for
to gaze afar/to look into the distance
earnest/ardent (hope etc)
to lean on sth and gaze into the distance
